fileSamples.statement: rppo ⊆ ⦗E⦘ ⨾ rppo ⨾ ⦗E⦘.
fileSamples.proofString:
unfold rppo.
rewrite (wf_ctrlE WF) at 1.
rewrite (wf_addrE WF) at 1.
rewrite wf_sbE at 1 2 3.
rewrite (wf_rmw_depE WF) at 1.
basic_solver 10.

fileSamples.statement:
(ctrl ∪ addr ⨾ sb^? ∪ rmw_dep ⨾ sb ∪ ⦗R_ex⦘ ⨾ sb) ⨾ ⦗W⦘
⊆ ⦗E⦘ ⨾ ((ctrl ∪ addr ⨾ sb^? ∪ rmw_dep ⨾ sb ∪ ⦗R_ex⦘ ⨾ sb) ⨾ ⦗W⦘) ⨾ ⦗E⦘.
fileSamples.proofString:
rewrite (wf_ctrlE WF) at 1.
rewrite (wf_addrE WF) at 1.
rewrite wf_sbE at 1 2 3.
rewrite (wf_rmw_depE WF) at 1.
basic_solver 10.

fileSamples.statement:
(⦗E⦘ ⨾ ctrl ⨾ ⦗E⦘ ∪ addr ⨾ sb^? ∪ rmw_dep ⨾ sb ∪ ⦗R_ex⦘ ⨾ sb) ⨾ ⦗W⦘
⊆ ⦗E⦘ ⨾ ((ctrl ∪ addr ⨾ sb^? ∪ rmw_dep ⨾ sb ∪ ⦗R_ex⦘ ⨾ sb) ⨾ ⦗W⦘) ⨾ ⦗E⦘.
fileSamples.proofString:
rewrite (wf_addrE WF) at 1.
rewrite wf_sbE at 1 2 3.
rewrite (wf_rmw_depE WF) at 1.
basic_solver 10.

fileSamples.statement:
(⦗E⦘ ⨾ ctrl ⨾ ⦗E⦘ ∪ (⦗E⦘ ⨾ addr ⨾ ⦗E⦘) ⨾ sb^? ∪ rmw_dep ⨾ sb ∪ ⦗R_ex⦘ ⨾ sb)
⨾ ⦗W⦘ ⊆ ⦗E⦘ ⨾ ((ctrl ∪ addr ⨾ sb^? ∪ rmw_dep ⨾ sb ∪ ⦗R_ex⦘ ⨾ sb) ⨾ ⦗W⦘) ⨾ ⦗E⦘.
fileSamples.proofString:
rewrite wf_sbE at 1 2 3.
rewrite (wf_rmw_depE WF) at 1.
basic_solver 10.

fileSamples.statement:
(⦗E⦘ ⨾ ctrl ⨾ ⦗E⦘ ∪ (⦗E⦘ ⨾ addr ⨾ ⦗E⦘) ⨾ (⦗E⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗E⦘)^?
 ∪ rmw_dep ⨾ ⦗E⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗E⦘ ∪ ⦗R_ex⦘ ⨾ ⦗E⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗E⦘) ⨾ ⦗W⦘
⊆ ⦗E⦘ ⨾ ((ctrl ∪ addr ⨾ sb^? ∪ rmw_dep ⨾ sb ∪ ⦗R_ex⦘ ⨾ sb) ⨾ ⦗W⦘) ⨾ ⦗E⦘.

(⦗E⦘ ⨾ ctrl ⨾ ⦗E⦘ ∪ (⦗E⦘ ⨾ addr ⨾ ⦗E⦘) ⨾ (⦗E⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗E⦘)^?
 ∪ (⦗E⦘ ⨾ rmw_dep ⨾ ⦗E⦘) ⨾ ⦗E⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗E⦘ ∪ ⦗R_ex⦘ ⨾ ⦗E⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗E⦘) ⨾ ⦗W⦘
⊆ ⦗E⦘ ⨾ ((ctrl ∪ addr ⨾ sb^? ∪ rmw_dep ⨾ sb ∪ ⦗R_ex⦘ ⨾ sb) ⨾ ⦗W⦘) ⨾ ⦗E⦘.
rppo ⊆ ⦗R⦘ ⨾ rppo ⨾ ⦗W⦘.
fileSamples.proofString:
unfold rppo.
rewrite (wf_ctrlD WF) at 1.
rewrite (wf_addrD WF) at 1.
rewrite (wf_rmw_depD WF) at 1.
generalize R_ex_in_R.
basic_solver 20.

fileSamples.statement:
(ctrl ∪ addr ⨾ sb^? ∪ rmw_dep ⨾ sb ∪ ⦗R_ex⦘ ⨾ sb) ⨾ ⦗W⦘
⊆ ⦗R⦘ ⨾ ((ctrl ∪ addr ⨾ sb^? ∪ rmw_dep ⨾ sb ∪ ⦗R_ex⦘ ⨾ sb) ⨾ ⦗W⦘) ⨾ ⦗W⦘.
fileSamples.proofString:
rewrite (wf_ctrlD WF) at 1.
rewrite (wf_addrD WF) at 1.
rewrite (wf_rmw_depD WF) at 1.
generalize R_ex_in_R.
basic_solver 20.

fileSamples.statement:
(⦗R⦘ ⨾ ctrl ∪ addr ⨾ sb^? ∪ rmw_dep ⨾ sb ∪ ⦗R_ex⦘ ⨾ sb) ⨾ ⦗W⦘
⊆ ⦗R⦘ ⨾ ((ctrl ∪ addr ⨾ sb^? ∪ rmw_dep ⨾ sb ∪ ⦗R_ex⦘ ⨾ sb) ⨾ ⦗W⦘) ⨾ ⦗W⦘.
fileSamples.proofString:
rewrite (wf_addrD WF) at 1.
rewrite (wf_rmw_depD WF) at 1.
generalize R_ex_in_R.
basic_solver 20.

fileSamples.statement:
(⦗R⦘ ⨾ ctrl ∪ (⦗R⦘ ⨾ addr ⨾ ⦗RW⦘) ⨾ sb^? ∪ rmw_dep ⨾ sb ∪ ⦗R_ex⦘ ⨾ sb) ⨾ ⦗W⦘
⊆ ⦗R⦘ ⨾ ((ctrl ∪ addr ⨾ sb^? ∪ rmw_dep ⨾ sb ∪ ⦗R_ex⦘ ⨾ sb) ⨾ ⦗W⦘) ⨾ ⦗W⦘.
fileSamples.proofString:
rewrite (wf_rmw_depD WF) at 1.
generalize R_ex_in_R.
basic_solver 20.

fileSamples.statement:
(⦗R⦘ ⨾ ctrl ∪ (⦗R⦘ ⨾ addr ⨾ ⦗RW⦘) ⨾ sb^? ∪ (⦗R⦘ ⨾ rmw_dep ⨾ ⦗R_ex⦘) ⨾ sb
 ∪ ⦗R_ex⦘ ⨾ sb) ⨾ ⦗W⦘
⊆ ⦗R⦘ ⨾ ((ctrl ∪ addr ⨾ sb^? ∪ rmw_dep ⨾ sb ∪ ⦗R_ex⦘ ⨾ sb) ⨾ ⦗W⦘) ⨾ ⦗W⦘.
addr ⨾ sb^? ⨾ ⦗W⦘ ⊆ (ctrl ∪ addr ⨾ sb^? ∪ rmw_dep ⨾ sb ∪ ⦗R_ex⦘ ⨾ sb) ⨾ ⦗W⦘.
ctrl ⨾ ⦗W⦘ ⊆ (ctrl ∪ addr ⨾ sb^? ∪ rmw_dep ⨾ sb ∪ ⦗R_ex⦘ ⨾ sb) ⨾ ⦗W⦘.
(rmw_dep ⨾ ⦗R_ex⦘) ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘ ⊆ rppo.

(rmw_dep ⨾ ⦗R_ex⦘) ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘
⊆ (ctrl ∪ addr ⨾ sb^? ∪ rmw_dep ⨾ sb ∪ ⦗R_ex⦘ ⨾ sb) ⨾ ⦗W⦘.
⦗R_ex⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘ ⊆ (ctrl ∪ addr ⨾ sb^? ∪ rmw_dep ⨾ sb ∪ ⦗R_ex⦘ ⨾ sb) ⨾ ⦗W⦘.
rppo ⨾ (⦗fun _ : actid => True⦘ ∪ sb) ⨾ ⦗W⦘ ⊆ rppo.
fileSamples.proofString:
rewrite seq_union_l, seq_union_r.
rewrite rppo_sb_in_rppo.
basic_solver.

fileSamples.statement: rppo ⨾ ⦗fun _ : actid => True⦘ ⨾ ⦗W⦘ ∪ rppo ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘ ⊆ rppo.
rppo ⨾ ⦗fun _ : actid => True⦘ ⨾ ⦗W⦘ ∪ rppo ⊆ rppo.
⦗R⦘ ⨾ (data ∪ (rfi ∪ rmw))＊ ⨾ rppo ⊆ ppo.
⦗R⦘ ⨾ (data ∪ rfi ∪ rmw)＊ ⨾ rppo ⊆ ppo.
(detour ⨾ ⦗R⦘ ∪ rfe) ⨾ (data ∪ rfi ∪ rmw)＊ ⨾ rppo ⊆ (detour ∪ rfe) ⨾ ppo.
fileSamples.proofString:
rewrite (dom_r (wf_rfeD WF)) at 1.
rewrite <- seq_union_l, !seqA.
by rewrite data_rfi_rmw_rppo_in_ppo.

fileSamples.statement:
(detour ⨾ ⦗R⦘ ∪ rfe ⨾ ⦗R⦘) ⨾ (data ∪ rfi ∪ rmw)＊ ⨾ rppo
⊆ (detour ∪ rfe) ⨾ ppo.
(detour ∪ rfe) ⨾ ⦗R⦘ ⨾ (data ∪ rfi ∪ rmw)＊ ⨾ rppo ⊆ (detour ∪ rfe) ⨾ ppo.
(detour ∪ rfe) ⨾ (data ∪ (rfi ∪ rmw))＊ ⨾ rppo ⊆ (detour ∪ rfe) ⨾ ppo.
(detour ∪ rfe) ⨾ (data ∪ rfi ∪ rmw)＊ ⨾ rppo ⊆ (detour ∪ rfe) ⨾ ppo.
